trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The BindingCompleteEventArgs contains information regarding exceptions or errors that occurred during a binding process.
trans-unit.target: BindingCompleteEventArgs 包含有关异常或绑定过程中出现的错误的信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified binding, error state, and binding context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref>使用指定的绑定、 错误状态和绑定上下文的类。

trans-unit.source: `state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: `state`指示绑定过程成功，还是出现了错误或异常。

trans-unit.source: `context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.
trans-unit.target: `context`指示当更新在绑定的控件或数据源时是否出现错误。

trans-unit.source: The binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 与此匹配项关联的绑定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified binding, error state and text, and binding context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref>与指定的绑定，错误状态和文本，以及绑定上下文的类。

trans-unit.source: `state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: `state`指示绑定过程成功，还是出现了错误或异常。

trans-unit.source: `context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.
trans-unit.target: `context`指示当更新在绑定的控件或数据源时是否出现错误。

trans-unit.source: The binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 与此匹配项关联的绑定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The error text or exception message for errors that occurred during the binding.
trans-unit.target: 绑定过程中发生的错误将错误文本或异常消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified binding, error state and text, binding context, and exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref>具有指定的绑定，错误状态和文本、 绑定上下文和异常类。

trans-unit.source: `state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: `state`指示绑定过程成功，还是出现了错误或异常。

trans-unit.source: `context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.
trans-unit.target: `context`指示当更新在绑定的控件或数据源时是否出现错误。

trans-unit.source: The binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 与此匹配项关联的绑定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The error text or exception message for errors that occurred during the binding.
trans-unit.target: 绑定过程中发生的错误将错误文本或异常消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that occurred during the binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>绑定过程中发生。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified binding, error state and text, binding context, exception, and whether the binding should be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref>类指定的绑定、 错误状态和文本、 绑定上下文、 异常，以及是否应取消绑定。

trans-unit.source: `state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: `state`指示绑定过程成功，还是出现了错误或异常。

trans-unit.source: `context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.
trans-unit.target: `context`指示当更新在绑定的控件或数据源时是否出现错误。

trans-unit.source: The binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 与此匹配项关联的绑定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The error text or exception message for errors that occurred during the binding.
trans-unit.target: 绑定过程中发生的错误将错误文本或异常消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that occurred during the binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>绑定过程中发生。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the binding and keep focus on the current control; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow focus to shift to another control.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要取消绑定并将焦点放置于当前的控件;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>以允许将焦点移动到另一个控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此匹配项关联的绑定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The Binding might also be associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> or of a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: 绑定还可能与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>或从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>继承的类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete>相关联

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the direction of the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取绑定操作的方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the completion state of the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取绑定操作的完成状态。

trans-unit.source: Use the BindingCompleteState to determine if the binding was successful, or an error or exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 使用 BindingCompleteState 以确定是否绑定成功，或者出现了错误或异常。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text description of the error that occurred during the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取绑定操作过程中发生的错误的文本说明。

trans-unit.source: This property returns an empty string if no error occurred in the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果绑定操作中未发生错误，则此属性返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: It returns the value of the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property when an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: 它返回的值<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性发生异常时。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text description of the error that occurred during the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: 绑定操作过程中发生的错误文本说明。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that occurred during the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取绑定操作过程中发生的异常。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if an exception did not occur during the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`null`如果绑定操作过程中没有发生异常。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that occurred during the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>绑定操作过程中发生。</xref:System.Exception>
